pyCE.cosmology.data package¶

Module contents¶

pyCE.cosmology.data.read_power_spectrum(telescope='Planck', ps='TT', psType='data')[source]¶
INPUT: telescope (string: Planck or WMAP)
ps (string: TT, TE, TM, or EM) psType (string: data, fit)
OUTPUT: dic (dictionary, keys: ell, Dl, Cl)
Outputs a dictionary containing the ell, D_ell, and C_ell values coming directly from the data from either Planck or WMAP.
